md:
giải nghĩa từ "also" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

1. Also (adverb) - Cũng, nữa, lại
	* Meaning: used to indicate that something is in addition to something else.
	* Example: I like reading books, and I also like watching movies.
	* Related words: too, as well, additionally
	* Antonyms: only, just, merely

2. Also (conjunction) - Cũng, nữa, lại
	* Meaning: used to connect two clauses or phrases.
	* Example: I went to the store, and I also bought some milk.
	* Related words: and, as well as, in addition
	* Antonyms: but, however, on the other hand

Note: In both cases, "also" is used to indicate addition or connection, but the grammatical function is different. As an adverb, "also" modifies a verb or a clause, while as a conjunction, "also" connects two clauses or phrases.

  1. Also (adverb) - Cũng, nữa, lại

    • Antonyms: only, just, merely

  2. Also (conjunction) - Cũng, nữa, lại

    • Meaning: used to connect two clauses or phrases.
    • Example: I went to the store, and I also bought some milk.
    • Related words: and, as well as, in addition
    • Antonyms: but, however, on the other hand

Note: In both cases, "also" is used to indicate addition or connection, but the grammatical function is different. As an adverb, "also" modifies a verb or a clause, while as a conjunction, "also" connects two clauses or phrases.
